Texts.Chs: 把^orange;碘^reset;带给^green;贝拉^reset;。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Iodine^reset; to ^green;Bella^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 干得好！一些基本的材料，例如^orange;碘^reset;，乃是必不可少的。因此多存储一点吧！你会特别需要^orange;碘^reset;来制作^orange;石墨烯^reset;以及高品质的^green;肥料^reset;的。
Texts.Eng: Good work! Several basic ingredients such as ^orange;Iodine^reset; are essential. So stay stocked! You'll need ^orange;Iodine^reset; specifically to make ^orange;Graphene^reset; and high quality ^green;fertilizers^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 如果你想得到^orange;碘^reset;你首先需要找到一些^orange;生硝石^reset;。把一批^orange;生硝石^reset;扔到你的^green;物质萃取器^reset;中，然后把所得的碘带给我！你可以在^orange;沙漠^reset;生态找到它们。
Texts.Eng: You'll need to find some ^orange;Caliche Stone^reset; if you want to get ^orange;Iodine^reset;. Throw batches of ^orange;Caliche Stone^reset; into your ^green;extraction lab^reset; and bring me some! You'll find them in ^orange;Desert^reset; biomes.
